data.description: make a ppm package from a CPAN distribution
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module simplifies the making of a ppm package from a CPAN
    distribution. In particular, it - guesses the ABSTRACT and AUTHOR
    attributes if these are not given in Makefile.PL - constructs the
    html docs from pod files and places them in the location the ppm
    utility expects - provides some shortcuts for setting some of the
    ppd file fields and attributes. As there's already a top-level
    PPM::, the choice of PPM::Make seemed reasonable.
